issue.title: GXP implementation of WMS GetFeatureInfo doesn't support WMS 1.3.0
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

To perform a GetFeatureInfo from a map, easySDI uses the GXP plugins WMSGetFeatureInfo.

This plugin builds the request, for a grid format, with the INFO_FORMAT param set to "application/vnd.ogc.gml".
This value is not compatible with WMS 1.3.0, it should be "application/vnd.ogc.wms_xml".
